Member of <nowiki>[[CanadianTeam]]</nowiki> and <nowiki>[[CanadianTeam-KitchenerWaterloo|KW Team]]</nowiki>; friend of <nowiki>[[CanadianTeam-Toronto|Toronto Team]]</nowiki>.

I have <nowiki>[[https://lists.ubuntu.com/archives/ubuntu-ca/2011-October/009179.html|volunteered]]</nowiki> to look after some jobs for the Canadian Team:

===== Meeting Secretary =====
* Make sure there's an <nowiki>[[CanadianTeam-Meetings|agenda]]</nowiki>.
* Post reminders to the mailing list and an announcement on the <nowiki>[[http://loco.ubuntu.com/teams/ubuntu-ca|LoCo directory]]</nowiki>.
* Post the minutes, with any action items, to the wiki.
* Post the meeting log to the wiki.

===== Team reports =====
* Ensure that our <nowiki>[[CanadianTeam-TeamReports|team report]]</nowiki> is updated before the end of every month.
* Usually, this doesn't involve much more than copying events down from the LoCo directory (or writing a script to do that).

I'm occasionally the Meeting Chair:
* Show up for the meeting
* Keep discussion on track, on topic and mostly following the agenda.

I attend Ubuntu Release Parties: <nowiki>[[http://picasaweb.google.com/mr.kim.king/Ubuntu710ReleaseParty|Gutsy]]</nowiki> <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/CanadianTeam/Toronto/GustyGibbonReleaseParty|Gibbon]]</nowiki>, <nowiki>[[https://laurelrusswurm.wordpress.com/2009/10/30/karmic-koala-release-party/|Karmic]]</nowiki>, <nowiki>[[https://secure.flickr.com/photos/ubuntucanada/7122827839/in/photostream/|Oneiric]]</nowiki>, <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/CanadianTeam/Toronto/Meetings/PrecisePangolinUbuntuHour(s)|Precise]]</nowiki>, <nowiki>[[http://bob.jonkman.ca/blogs/2012/10/21/pictures-from-the-kw-ubuntu-release-party/|Quantal]]</nowiki>, <nowiki>[[http://pix.ie/ubuntuca/album/464470/detailed|Raring]]</nowiki>...
